issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement INTERVAL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10816](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10816). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Of the 22 TPC-H queries, 9 depend on the INTERVAL functionality. e.g. from query 1:

l_shipdate <= date '1998-12-01' - **interval** '[DELTA]' day (3)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10816?focusedCommentId=17280471) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9373
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9373>
